creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund; purchase from the collection of Elizabeth and Willard Clark
description: four sided basket with open weave, narrows towards top, round opening; short irregular handle made of twisted strips of bamboo wound over a round piece of bamboo; one twisted strip of bamboo ends in large loop on one side of handle; flower cylinder is reddish-brown lacquered bamboo with ridges, lined with copper
signed: etched onto bottom: [ 和一斎造 ]
title: Passing Shower
